attributes.action: LUSH UK to remove all store front displays stating police are "PAID TO LIE"
attributes.background: The SPYCOPS campaign by LUSH UK is misguided and ill thought out. The actions of a very small minority should not be used to persecute all current hardworking front line police officers. LUSH UK should acknowledge this, and remove all store front displays stating police are "PAID TO LIE"

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Lush, not the UK Government or Parliament.
